name: Daisy Edge Flipper
description: Simple algorithm for flipping edges in daisy pattern

name: Right Trigger
description: The fundamental right-hand algorithm used throughout cube solving

name: Left Trigger
description: The left-hand counterpart to the Right Trigger

name: Second Layer Right Edge
description: Ideal case for inserting right edge in F2L - perfect for beginners learning F2L

name: Second Layer Left Edge
description: Ideal case for inserting left edge in F2L - perfect for beginners learning F2L

name: Kite OLL
notation: F U R U' R' F'
description: OLL algorithm that creates a cross pattern on the top face

name: Sune
notation: R U R' U R U2 R'
description: A fundamental OLL algorithm that orients the top face corners

name: T-Perm Setup
notation: L' U R U' L U R'
description: A setup move used to prepare the cube for T-Perm algorithm execution

name: E-Perm
notation: F2 U R' L F2 L' R U F2
description: Advanced PLL algorithm for diagonal corner swap in the last layer

name: E-Perm Inverse
notation: F2 U' R' L F2 L' R U' F2
description: Inverse version of E-Perm for diagonal corner swap in the opposite direction
